hero_title: Building a Digital Product, Brand, and Experience
hero_text: At Collax, we specialize in designing, building, shipping, and scaling beautiful, usable products with blazing-fast efficiency.
brand_title: Over 35k+ software businesses growing with Collax

recruitment.title: Healthcare Recruitment
recruitment.description: Open the door to an international career in healthcare. We assist in the recruitment process for positions in Germany and Saudi Arabia, managing placement, visas, and cultural integration.

students_placement.title: Student Placement
students_placement.description: Study at the top universities in Germany and France. We assist with admissions, from application preparation to settling in your new country.

professional_training.title: Professional Training
professional_training.description: Germany is renowned for its excellence in professional training. We facilitate your entry into high-quality programs in technology, engineering, and healthcare.

language_school.title: Language School
language_school.description: Learn new languages and unlock new opportunities. Our German language school offers courses for all levels, from beginner to advanced.

features.description: We excel in offering efficient, reliable, and high-quality services to support our clients.

question_one.title: How can I apply for a job in the healthcare sector?
question_one.description: We assist you throughout the entire application process, including document preparation, interviews, and visa management. You can submit your CV on our site, and our team will contact you for the next steps.

question_two.title: How can I enroll in a university in Germany or France?
question_two.description: We assist you in finding the best universities, submitting your application, and following up on your admissions. Our advisors are here to guide you every step of the way.

question_three.title: What are the requirements for accessing professional training in Germany?
question_three.description: Professional training in Germany typically requires a basic knowledge of the German language and a high school diploma. We also offer language courses to help you prepare.

question_four.title: Do you offer language courses to learn German?
question_four.description: Yes, we offer language courses for all levels. Whether you are a beginner or want to perfect your German, our qualified teachers are here to help you succeed.

question_five.title: How can I get help with my application?
question_five.description: Our team is available to answer all your questions via email or phone. You can also check the contact section on our website for more information.
